fulltext:
BUI THI NGOC ANH | SALES MANAGER 
  anhbtn1902@gmail.com | (+84) 707213893/ 0908958993  
356 Xo Viet Nghe Tinh, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/anhbtn1902 
  Professional Profile 
-
A target-oriented Sales Manager. Built and maintained a client base of over 600+ brands in F&B, Health and Beauty. 
Successfully negotiated and won multiple long-term deals with big brands that ultimately contributed 50% to the monthly 
sales record of the company for the past 3 years. Built and trained a skillful team of sales executives in Hanoi and HCMC.  
-
Looking for new opportunities at ecommerce, sales, manager, operations. 
Experiences   
NGUYEN’S GROUP JSC
About product: Meete is an award-winning solution to increase sales and build a loyal customer base for brands in F&B, 
Health and Beauty.  
HCMC Sales Manager and Team Lead 
          6/2018 – 6/2019  
Key achievements:
●
Managed Health and Beauty Team (4-8 members) to build a client base of 600+ brands in Health and Beauty 
(The Body Shop, NYX, Yves Rocher, etc…) 
●
Trained 30+ sales and business development executives for HCMC Team  
●
Liaised with other departments (Marketing, Merchant Success, IT, Operations) to successfully execute the deal 
with clients 
●
Developed a strategic plan to increase sales  
Hanoi Sales Manager and Team Lead
        10/2017 – 5/2018  
Key achievements: 
●
Conducted research to increase sales growth in Hanoi 
●
Successfully recruited, built and trained a skillful team of 10 business development executives from scratch 
●
Managed Hanoi Team to close deals with 200+ brands in F&B, Health and Beauty in the city 
Business Development Executive 
                 6/2016 – 9/2017  
Key achievements: 
●
Conducted over 30 cold calls + and 15 meeting per week to seek for new clients 
●
Built and maintained a client base of 500+ brands in F&B (Domino Pizza, Toco Toco, Koi The, Alfresco Group, 
The Pizza Company, Dairy Queen, Swensen, etc…) in HCMC and Hanoi 
●
Successfully negotiated and closed long-term deals with 2 big brands in F&B in HCMC  
●
Liaised with other departments (Marketing, Merchant Success, IT, Operations) to successfully execute the deal 
with clients 
●
Contributed 50% to the monthly sales of the company  
Education 
Hue University of Foreign Languages 
    9/2011 – 7/2015 
BA, International Relations  
Soft Skills 
●
Strong negotiation skills 
●
Interpersonal communication 
●
Problem-solving skills 
●
Business and target-oriented mindset  
Other Skills  
●
IT & Software: MS Office, Cloud storages, 
CRM 
●
Languages: English, Vietnamese  
References 
Nguyen Canh Duong (Mr.) 
CEO, MEETE CO. LTD 
duong@meete.co / +84 938 180 160
